```python
roles = ["Role1", "Role2", "Role3", "Role4", "Role5", "Role6", "Role7"]

total_points = 100

# 生成随机数
random_points = random.randint(1, total_points)

# 计算每个角色应有的平均点数
average_points = total_points // len(roles)

# 计算每个角色最低点数
min_points = average_points

# 重新分配剩余的点数
remaining_points = total_points - min_points * len(roles)
reallocated_points = random.sample(range(1, remaining_points + 1), remaining_points)

# 分配点数
point_distribution = {}
for i, role in enumerate(roles):
    point_distribution[role] = min_points + reallocated_points[i]

# 输出结果
print(point_distribution)
```
